{\ottdrulename{TP\_snd}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \sqsubseteq  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_cons}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXListe}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{5}}}}     \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{6}}}}     \quad   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \colon   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \sqsubseteq  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \colon   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{5}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{6}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_Liste}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXFun}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) .  \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{)}  \sqsubseteq  \ottsym{(}   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ) .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_Fun}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \sqsubseteq  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_app}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXunboxing}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottnt{A} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_unboxing}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXboxing}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \sqsubseteq  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{box}_{ \ottnt{A} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_boxing}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXspliting}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{split}_{ \ottnt{S} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_spliting}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXsquashing}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{S} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \sqsubseteq  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{squash}_{ \ottnt{S} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_squashing}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXtfun}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \sqsubseteq  \ottsym{(}   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_tfun}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXtapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{A}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \sqsubseteq   [  \ottnt{B}  ]  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_tapp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTPXXerror}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \ottnt{A}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{error}_{ \ottnt{A} }   \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TP\_error}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntermpre}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \sqsubseteq  \ottnt{t'} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXsplit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXsquash{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXunbox{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXsucc{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXNate{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXpair{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXfst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXsnd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXcons{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXListe{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXFun{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXsquashing{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXtfun{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXtapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTPXXerror{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvarP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \, \in \, \Gamma}%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_varP}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \, \in \, \Gamma}%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXBox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{box}_{ \ottnt{A} }   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_Box}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXUnbox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottnt{A} }   :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_Unbox}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXBoxP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{box}   :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \mathbb{S}  ).  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{X}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{)}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_BoxP}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXUnboxP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{unbox}   :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \mathbb{S}  ).  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \rightarrow  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{)}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_UnboxP}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsquash}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{squash}_{ \ottnt{S} }   :  \ottnt{S}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_squash}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsplit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{split}_{ \ottnt{S} }   :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{S} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_split}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXunitP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{triv}   :   \mathsf{Unit}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_unitP}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXzeroP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottsym{0}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_zeroP}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_succ}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXncase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Nat}   \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t}  \colon   \mathsf{Nat}  \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_ncase}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottsym{[]}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \top  ).   \mathsf{List}\, \ottmv{X}   }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_empty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_cons}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlcase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t}  \colon   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}  \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_lcase}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_pair}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_fst}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_snd}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} ) .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_lam}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_app}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t}   :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_Lam}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtypeApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B} ).  \ottnt{C}    \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_typeApp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXSub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_Sub}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXerror}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }   \mathsf{error}_{ \ottnt{A} }   :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_error}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretracT}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottnt{A} }  \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{box}_{ \ottnt{A} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_retracT}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretracTE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  \neq  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottnt{A} }  \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{box}_{ \ottnt{B} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{error}_{ \ottnt{A} } }{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_retracTE}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretractU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{split}_{ \ottnt{S} }  \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{squash}_{ \ottnt{S} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_retractU}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXerror}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \vdash_{\mathsf{CG} }  \mathcal{E}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\mathcal{E}  \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{error}_{ \ottnt{B} }   \ottsym{]}  \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{error}_{ \ottnt{A} } }{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_error}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseZero}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{0}  \colon   \mathsf{Nat}  \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_ncase0}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseSucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \colon   \mathsf{Nat}  \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_ncaseSucc}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseEmpty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{[]}  \colon   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}  \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_lcaseEmpty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseCons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \colon   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}  \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_lcaseCons}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_beta}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXprojOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\mathsf{fst} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_proj1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXprojTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\mathsf{snd} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_proj2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXtypeBeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottsym{(}   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B} ) . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{)}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_typeBeta}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXtypeApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_typeApp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXCong}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\mathcal{E}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \rightsquigarrow  \mathcal{E}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rd\_Cong}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{\ottcom{call by name}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXretracT{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXretracTE{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXerror{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXncaseSucc{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseEmpty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseCons{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXprojOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXprojTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXtypeBeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXtypeApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXCong{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
